about.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a passionate AI engineer and startup founder from Bangladesh, driven by the vision of creating intelligent solutions that bridge technology with real-world impact.
From founding AIELTS and winning the UIHP National Award to leading Intelleeo as Chairman, I've dedicated my career to pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI and machine learning.
My journey combines deep technical expertise with entrepreneurial vision, always focusing on solutions that matter to people and communities.

featuredProjects.title: Featured
featuredProjects.subtitle: Building innovative solutions that make a real impact in the world

heroProject.title: AIELTS - AI-Powered IELTS Preparation Platform
heroProject.description: Revolutionary AI platform that achieved 95% accuracy in IELTS score prediction and helped 10,000+ students improve their scores.

secondaryProjects.title: Intelleeo Platform
secondaryProjects.description: Advanced analytics dashboard for startup metrics and KPI tracking.

secondaryProjects.title: Smart Contract Analyzer
secondaryProjects.description: AI-powered tool for smart contract vulnerability detection.

featuredResearch.title: Featured
featuredResearch.subtitle: Pushing the boundaries of AI and machine learning through innovative research

heroResearch.title: Large Language Models for Bangladeshi Language Processing
heroResearch.description: Groundbreaking research on fine-tuning LLMs for Bengali language understanding, achieving state-of-the-art results in sentiment analysis and machine translation.

secondaryResearch.title: AI-Driven Code Generation for Low-Resource Languages
secondaryResearch.description: Novel approach to automated code generation using multi-modal transformers.

secondaryResearch.title: Federated Learning in Edge Computing
secondaryResearch.description: Privacy-preserving machine learning framework for distributed systems.

testimonials.title: What People
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from colleagues, collaborators, and industry leaders

items.name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
items.content: Sheikh Yeasin's work on Bengali language processing has been groundbreaking. His approach to fine-tuning LLMs shows exceptional understanding of both technical depth and cultural context.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: AIELTS has revolutionized how students prepare for language proficiency tests. The AI accuracy and user experience Galib created is truly remarkable.

items.name: Maria Rodriguez
items.content: Working with Galib on research collaborations has been inspiring. His innovative thinking and technical execution consistently exceed expectations.

callToAction.title: Let's Build Something
callToAction.subtitle: Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate on research, or just want to connect, I'd love to hear from you.
